1.content: Before we get into the main story what gender are you?
1.title: What gender are you?

12.content: And last but not least were you a trainer before the incident or just an average person?
12.title: Are you a trainer or not

choices: He lands the hit on you
121.content:
“It’s been 2 years since the outbreak and Pokémon ravage the world in search for humans to satisfy themselves” you tell John. He was your best friend and rival before everything happened.

“It’s too risky to make a resource run” you tell him. “ it doesn’t matter we may have food for a couple of days but the radio says the elite four won’t be back in our town for a couple of weeks, we need to act fast” he tells you. As you think you soon hear some truth to his words and decide it’s the right thing to do.

As you make your way to the local pokemart you and John grab whatever you can in a matter of 10 minutes. You and John collect yourself sand begin to walk back. You notice John being really quiet. You reach for your charmeleon Pokéball just in case something is wrong but there’s nothing!

John turns around and a cloud of purple smoke follows. A male zoroark is revealed through the illusion and goes to swipe at you.
121.title: Trainer

info.brief_description: A gas has polluted the world causing Pokémon and humans to be lustful zombies.
info.description:
The story takes place in a world inhabited by Pokémon. After a lab testing took place trying to create new Pokémon like mewtwo a freak accident happened and released a highly addictive gas into the environment. The gas enduces the target into a lustful trance and they loose all control of their mind as if they were a female in heat and they will do anything to satisfy their urges.

A couple rules to follow in the story

- the gas only effects wild Pokémon or captured Pokémon who don’t like their trainers

-The gas affects Pokémon but if given in a high enough dosage (by a Pokémon or other human)it can hypnotize humans into its lustful trance.

-the Pokémon are smarter than regular Pokémon

-Anthros are allowed

-No Scat please

Have fun and please keep chapters long!
